from collections.abc import Mapping
from itertools import chain
from operator import add
#ignore FutureWarning messages 
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings("ignore", message="iteritems is deprecated")
from notebookutils import mssparkutils
from pprint import pprint as pp
import json
import pyspark.sql.functions as F 
import pandas as pd
from pyspark.sql.types import *
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
from pyspark.sql.functions import lit
from pyspark.sql.functions import row_number
from pyspark.sql.functions import *
from pyspark.sql.window import Window

from notebookutils import mssparkutils
### mount the data lake storage in Synapse to the Synapse File Mount API
jobId = mssparkutils.env.getJobId()
storage_acc_name = spark.sparkContext.environment.get('dataLakeAccountName', 'get')
mount_storage(path="abfss://odw-raw@"+storage_acc_name+".dfs.core.windows.net/ZenDesk/historical/", mount_point="/zendesk_items")

def zendesk_hist():
       List= []
       #make sure you chnage the name of the file with the latest file export which is taken from  the blob storage 
       with open(f"/synfs/{jobId}/zendesk_items/historical_2023-09-04.json", 'r',encoding="utf-8-sig") as json_file:
              zendesk_list = json.load(json_file)
              # print(type(zendesk_list))
              for page in zendesk_list:
                     tickets_list = page["tickets"]
                     for item in tickets_list:
                            List.append(item)
       pddf=pd.DataFrame(List)
       pddf=pddf.applymap(str)
       pddf = pddf.dropna(axis='columns', how='all') # Drops columns with all NA values
       # print(pddf.dtypes)
       df = spark.createDataFrame(pddf)
       partition = Window.partitionBy("SourceSystemID").orderBy('id')
       df = df.withColumn("SourceSystemID",lit(6)).withColumn('IngestionDate', F.current_timestamp()).withColumn('ValidTo', lit("NULL")).withColumn('IsActive', lit("Y")).withColumn('RowID', row_number().over(partition))

       spark.sql(f"drop table if exists odw_standardised_db.zendesk_legacy;")
       df.write.format('delta').saveAsTable("odw_standardised_db.zendesk_legacy")
                     
print(zendesk_hist())

%%sql
MERGE INTO odw_standardised_db.zendesk_system_extract AS Target
USING odw_standardised_db.zendesk_legacy	AS Source
ON Source.id = Target.id
    
    -- For Inserts
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (
    allow_attachments,
    allow_channelback,
    assignee,
    brand_id,
    collaborator,
    comments,
    created_at,
    custom_fields,
    custom_status_id,
    dates,
    description,
    due_at,
    email_cc_ids,
    external_id,
    fields,
    follower_ids,
    followup_ids,
    forum_topic_id,
    from_messaging_channel,
    generated_timestamp,
    group,
    has_incidents,
    id,
    is_public,
    metric_set,
    organization,
    priority,
    problem_id,
    raw_subject,
    recipient,
    requester,
    satisfaction_rating,
    sharing_agreement_ids,
    status,
    subject,
    submitter,
    tags,
    ticket_form_id,
    type,
    updated_at,
    url,
    via,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    IsActive,
    RowID
    ) 
   
    VALUES (
        IFNULL(Source.allow_attachments, "NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.allow_channelback, "NO INFO"),
        Source.assignee_id,
        IFNULL(Source.brand_id, "NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.collaborator_ids, "NO INFO"),
        "NO COMMENTS",
        IFNULL(Source.created_at, "NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.custom_fields, "NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.custom_status_id, "NO INFO"),
        "NO DATES",
        IFNULL(Source.description, "NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.due_at, "NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.email_cc_ids, "NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.external_id, "NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.fields, "NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.follower_ids, "NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.followup_ids, "NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.forum_topic_id, "NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.from_messaging_channel, "NO INFO"),
        "NO GENERATED TIMESTAMP",
        IFNULL(Source.group_id, "NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.has_incidents, "NO INFO"),
        Source.id,
        IFNULL(Source.is_public, "NO INFO"),
        "NO METRIC SET",
        IFNULL(Source.organization_id, "NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.priority, "NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.problem_id, "NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.raw_subject, "NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.recipient, "NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.requester_id, "NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.satisfaction_rating, "NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.sharing_agreement_ids, "NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.status, "NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.subject, "NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.submitter_id, "NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.tags, "NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.ticket_form_id, "NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.type, "NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.updated_at, "NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.url, "NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.via, "NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.SourceSystemID,"NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.IngestionDate,"NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.ValidTo,"NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.IsActive,"NO INFO"),
        IFNULL(Source.RowID, "NO INFO")
